beam_control.F90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                BEAM_CONTROL
00004 !
00005 !  Interactive control of particle source
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine beam_control
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   use utils
00014   implicit none
00015   include 'mpif.h'
00016 
00017   integer :: i, p, iseed1, iseed2, ierr
00018   real :: Volb, dpx, yt, zt, vosc_old, sigma_old, tpulse_old, u_old, theta_old, phi_old
00019   integer :: lvisit_active=0
00020   real :: ct, st, cp, sp, vx_beam, vy_beam, vz_beam, th_beam, xb, yb, zb
00021   logical :: beam_on = .true.
00022   logical :: beam_debug = .true.
00023 
00024   integer, save :: np_beam_dt  ! current # beam particles
00025 
00026   ! First check for VISIT connection
00027 
00028 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00029 !  if (me==0)   call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00030   if (me==0)   call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00031   call MPI_BCAST( lvisit_active, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00032 #endif
00033 
00034   if (lvisit_active==0 )then
00035      if (me==0) write(*,*) ' No Connection to Visualization'
00036      return
00037   endif
00038 
00039   if (itime == 0) then
00040      np_beam_dt = np_beam  ! initial # beam particles to introduce per timestep
00041   endif
00042 
00043   !  if (.not. beam_on) return
00044 
00045   !  if (npart + np_beam_dt > npartm .or. max_list_length > nintmax-20) then
00046   !     if (me==0) write(*,*) 'Array limit reached: switching off beam'
00047   !     beam_on = .false.
00048   !     return
00049   !  endif
00050 
00051   if ( beam_config == 5) then
00052       ! Define beam from laser parameters
00053      vosc_old = vosc
00054      sigma_old = sigma
00055      u_beam = vosc
00056      rho_beam = sigma
00057      r_beam = tpulse  
00058 
00059   else if ( beam_config >=3 .and. beam_config <=4) then
00060       ! Define beam from laser parameters
00061      vosc_old = vosc
00062      sigma_old = sigma
00063      u_beam = vosc
00064      rho_beam = sigma
00065      th_beam = theta_beam  ! incidence angle instead of pulse duration
00066      theta_old = th_beam
00067 
00068   else if (scheme==4 .and. .not. (beam_config<=3 .and. beam_config>0)) then
00069      ! Temperature clamp mode - laser should be off
00070      u_beam = Te_kev
00071 
00072   else if (scheme == 5) then
00073      ! ion crystal eqm  mode:
00074      !  r_beam is mean ion spacing
00075      !  u_beam is ion temperature (eV)
00076      !  rho_beam is potential constant
00077      r_beam = a_ii
00078      u_beam = Ti_keV
00079      rho_beam = log10(bond_const)
00080 
00081   else if (beam_config==8) then ! dust particle
00082      u_old = u_beam
00083      theta_old = theta_beam
00084      phi_old = phi_beam
00085   endif
00086 
00087 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
00088   if (itime == 0 .and. me==0 )  then
00089 !     call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00090      call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00091   ! Specify default parameters at beginning of run
00092      call flvisit_spk_beam_paraminit_send(th_beam,phi_beam,r_beam,rho_beam,u_beam)
00093   endif
00094 
00095 
00096   if (me==0) then
00097 !     call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00098      call flvisit_nbody2_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00099 
00100      ! Fetch real-time, user-specified control parameters
00101      if (lvisit_active /= 0) then 
00102 !  TODO:  Need XNBODY equivalent here
00103 !        call flvisit_spk_beam_param_recv( th_beam,phi_beam,r_beam,rho_beam,u_beam)
00104      else
00105         write(*,*) ' No Connection to Visualization'
00106         return
00107      endif
00108 
00109   endif
00110 
00111 #endif
00112 
00113   ! Broadcast beam parameters to all other PEs
00114   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)   ! Synchronize first
00115   call MPI_BCAST( lvisit_active, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00116   if (lvisit_active /= 0) then
00117      call MPI_BCAST( th_beam, 1, MPI_REAL8, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00118      call MPI_BCAST( phi_beam, 1, MPI_REAL8, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00119      call MPI_BCAST( r_beam, 1, MPI_REAL8, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00120      call MPI_BCAST( rho_beam, 1, MPI_REAL8, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00121      call MPI_BCAST( u_beam, 1, MPI_REAL8, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00122   else
00123      if (me==0) write(*,*) ' No Connection to Visualization'
00124      return
00125   endif
00126 
00127 !  if (rho_beam==0 )then
00128 !     if (me==0) write(*,*) ' Switching off beam'
00129 !
00130 !     return
00131 !  endif
00132 
00133   if (beam_config >= 3 .and. beam_config <=5 ) then
00134      ! laser standing wave or pond bullet
00135 
00136      !     u_beam = max(abs(u_beam),0.1)
00137      !     rho_beam = max(abs(rho_beam),0.5)
00138      !     r_beam = max(abs(r_beam),0.1)
00139      
00140      if (u_beam/vosc <10.0 .and. u_beam/vosc > 0.1) then
00141         vosc=u_beam ! limit amplitude change
00142         if (me==0 .and. vosc /= vosc_old) write(*,*) 'Laser amplitude changed'
00143      else
00144         if (me==0) write(*,*) 'Amplitude change too big - readjust!'
00145      endif
00146 
00147      if (sigma/rho_beam > 0.1 .and. sigma/rho_beam < 10.0) then
00148         sigma=rho_beam
00149         if (me==0 .and. sigma /= sigma_old) write(*,*) 'Laser spot size changed'
00150      else
00151         if (me==0) write(*,*) 'Spot size change too big - readjust!'
00152      endif
00153      if (tpulse/r_beam > 0.1 .and. tpulse/r_beam < 10.0) then
00154         tpulse=r_beam
00155      else
00156         if (me==0) write(*,*) 'Pulse length change too big - readjust!'
00157         if (me==0 .and. tpulse /= tpulse_old) write(*,*) 'Laser pulse length changed'
00158      endif
00159 
00160      if (th_beam /= theta_beam) then
00161         theta_beam=th_beam
00162         if (me==0 .and. theta_beam /= theta_old) write(*,*) 'Incidence angle changed'
00163      endif
00164 
00165   else if (beam_config ==2) then
00166      nb_pe = np_beam_dt/num_pe  ! # beam particles to load per PE
00167 
00168      if (me ==0 .and. beam_debug) then
00169         write(*,*) 'beam parts ',nb_pe,' theta ',theta_beam,' phi ', phi_beam
00170         write(*,*) 'r ',r_beam,' rho ',rho_beam,' u ',u_beam, ' dt ',np_beam_dt
00171      endif
00172 
00173      Volb = pi*r_beam**2*x_beam       !  beam cylinder volume:  r_beam is radius
00174      qeb = Volb*rho_beam/np_beam    ! charge
00175      dpx=x_beam/nb_pe           ! x-axis spacing
00176      iseed2 = -131 - np_beam -3*me ! seed
00177      iseed1 = -333 - np_beam -3*me
00178 
00179      if (qeb <0 ) then
00180         mass_beam = 1.  ! electrons
00181      else
00182         mass_beam = 1836.  ! protons
00183      endif
00184 
00185 
00186 
00187      ! particle beam initialised along x-axis and rotated by theta, phi
00188      ct = cos(theta_beam)
00189      st = sin(theta_beam)
00190      cp = cos(phi_beam)
00191      sp = sin(phi_beam)
00192      vz_beam = -u_beam*st
00193      vx_beam = u_beam*ct*cp
00194      vy_beam = u_beam*ct*sp
00195 
00196 
00197      i = 0
00198 
00199      do while (i < nb_pe)
00200         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed2)-1.)          
00201         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)  
00202         if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00203            i = i+1
00204            p = npp+i  ! put them after last particle on this PE
00205            xb=  dpx*i + dpx/num_pe*me
00206            yb = yt 
00207            zb = zt 
00208 
00209            ! Now rotate disc about Euler angles
00210 
00211            x(p) =  xb*ct*cp - yb*ct*sp + zb*st 
00212            y(p) =  xb*sp    + yb*cp             
00213            z(p) =  -xb*st*cp + yb*st*sp + zb*ct 
00214 
00215            ! Add starting point
00216            x(p) = x(p) + start_beam
00217            y(p) = y(p) + yl/2.
00218            z(p) = z(p) + zl/2.
00219 
00220            q(p) = qeb
00221            m(p) = abs(qeb)*mass_beam
00222            ux(p)=vx_beam
00223            uy(p)=vy_beam
00224            uz(p)=vz_beam
00225            pepid(p) = me                ! processor ID
00226            pelabel(p) = npart+me*nb_pe+i  ! labels
00227            Ex(p) = 0.
00228            Ey(p) = 0.
00229            Ez(p) = 0.
00230            Bx(p) = 0.
00231            By(p) = 0.
00232            Bz(p) = 0.
00233            Ax(p) = 0.
00234            Ay(p) = 0.
00235            Az(p) = 0.
00236            pot(p) =0.
00237            work(p) =0.
00238         endif
00239      end do
00240 
00241      ! Augment total # particles - have to limit increase to max array size
00242      npp = npp+nb_pe
00243      np_beam = np_beam + np_beam_dt
00244      npart = npart + np_beam_dt
00245 
00246 
00247   else if (beam_config ==8) then
00248      ! Dust particle - # beam particles constant; infinite mass
00249 
00250      if (me==0 .and. u_beam /= u_old) write(*,*) 'Beam velocity changed'
00251 
00252      if (me ==0 .and. beam_debug) then
00253         write(*,*) ' theta ',theta_beam,' phi ', phi_beam,' u ',u_beam
00254      endif
00255      ! dust particle velocity rotated by theta, phi
00256      ! beam particles could be sitting anywhere now
00257      Volb = 4*pi/3.*r_beam**3
00258      qeb = Volb*rho_beam/np_beam    ! new charge
00259      ct = cos(theta_beam)
00260      st = sin(theta_beam)
00261      cp = cos(phi_beam)
00262      sp = sin(phi_beam)
00263      vy_beam = u_beam*st*cp*vte*10   ! Scale by thermal velocity
00264      vx_beam = u_beam*st*sp*vte*10
00265      vz_beam = u_beam*ct*vte*10
00266      do i=1,npp
00267         if (pelabel(i)>ne+ni) then
00268            ux(i) = vx_beam
00269            uy(i) = vy_beam
00270            uz(i) = vz_beam
00271            q(i) = qeb
00272         endif
00273 
00274      end do
00275 
00276   else if (scheme == 5) then
00277      ! ion crystal eqm  mode:
00278      !  r_beam is mean ion spacing
00279      !  u_beam is ion temperature (eV)
00280      !  rho_beam is potential constant
00281 !     a_ii = r_beam
00282 !     Ti_kev = u_beam
00283 !     bond_const = 10**(rho_beam)
00284      if (me==0) write(*,*) 'Steering pars: a_i=',a_ii,' Ti=',Ti_kev,' Pot strength=',bond_const
00285   else if (scheme==4) then
00286      ! Electron temp clamp
00287      Te_kev = u_beam
00288   endif
00289 
00290 
00291 end subroutine beam_control
